messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the EasyCard 1000 package.
What does the EasyCard 1000 package include?
Can you tell me the benefits of the EasyCard 1000 package?
What resources are provided in the EasyCard 1000 package?

The EasyCard 1000 package includes 18GB of internet data plus an additional 18GB from 1am to 9am, 7,000 on-net minutes (Telenor & PTCL), 600 off-net minutes, and 10,000 SMS for Rs. 950 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days.

How can I activate the EasyCard 1000 package?
What is the process to subscribe to the EasyCard 1000 package?
How do I get the EasyCard 1000 package?

To activate the EasyCard 1000 package, dial *248# or load Rs. 1100 on Easypaisa or MyTelenor App. The package will provide 18GB of data plus an additional 18GB from 1am to 9am, 7,000 on-net minutes, 600 off-net minutes, and 10,000 SMS for 30 days.

All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the EasyCard 1000 package.

How long is the EasyCard 1000 package valid?
What is the validity period for the EasyCard 1000 package?
For how many days does the EasyCard 1000 package remain active?

The EasyCard 1000 package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be informed once the package expires. Re-subscribing within the validity period will extend the offer for another 30 days.
